citation.article-title: Transfer of Bacillus ehimensis and Bacillus chitinolyticus to the genus Paenibacillus with emended descriptions of Paenibacillus ehimensis comb. nov. and Paenibacillus chitinolyticus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Paenibacillus chitinolyticus (Kuroshima et al. 1996) comb. nov.
Paenibacillus chitinolyticus (chi.ti.no.lyâ€²ti.cus. N.L. n. chitinum chitin; M.L. adj. lyticus dissolving; N.L. adj. chitinolyticus decomposing chitin).
Basonym: Bacillus chitinolyticus Kuroshima et al. 1996.
The description is the same as that given by Kuroshima et al. (1996).
